content: A mysterious object has appeared simultaneously in different parts of the world... What strange phenomena does this object trigger in your story?
"this object starts spraying water at all humans it sees. lots of water"

As the mysterious objects appeared globally, a peculiar rift opened in the sky, connecting the world's oceans directly to the clouds. This resulted in these objects using their new "hoses" to spray water at all humans. But here's the twist: what happens to those who embrace the water and start to dance in the rain?
